SELECT t_da_brand.country_id as countryId, brand_id as brandId, brand_name as brandName, brand_english as brandEnglish, t_da_brand.created_by as createdBy, date_format(t_da_brand.created_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as createdDate, t_da_brand.lastupdated_by as lastupdatedBy, date_format(t_da_brand.lastupdated_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as lastupdatedDate, t_da_brand.active_flag as activeFlag, t_da_country.country_name as countryName, t_da_country.country_abbreviation as countryAbbreviation FROM t_da_brand LEFT JOIN t_da_country ON t_da_brand.country_id = t_da_country.country_id WHERE brand_id > 0
brand_name like '%$param.brandName$%'
$orderByStatement$
LIMIT $first$, $pageSize$;

SELECT count(*) as total FROM t_da_brand LEFT JOIN t_da_country ON t_da_brand.country_id = t_da_country.country_id WHERE brand_id > 0
brand_name = '%$param.brandName$%'

brand_name = '$brandName$'
country_id = $countryId$
brand_id != $brandId$
